name: WhichWayOut?
description:
WhichWayOut? is a dark themed physics puzzle platformer.

The aim of the game is to find your way out of each level by means of abilities such as clones and light bullets.

The game will test your patience as you try to figure out what's real and what's not with limited vision and instant death awaiting failure.

The game has 20 increasing hard levels that will test the very best players.

so there is only one question left, can you make it out?
